name: Sipexa Flow for WordPress
author: sipexa.com

sections.description:
Add web forms from your Sipexa Flow account to your WordPress website or blog.

This form builder plugin requires a Sipexa Flow account. You can sign up for free at: Sipexa Flow – sipexaflow.com.

Enjoy the experience of building professional web forms without using code.

Features

  • Real-time WYSIWYG editor with field types for any form building scenario
  • Live reports, custom filtering
  • Unlimited records and submission
  • Mobile friendly (Mobile responsive)
  • Payment Gateway: Stripe
  • Approval workflow
  • Integrated Visual Workflow Designer
  • Integrated Visual Organizational Structure Designer

Find out more at: Sipexa – sipexa.com
Product page at: Sipexa Flow – sipexaflow.com

WordPress form builder plugin that allows you to create web forms directly in your WordPress dashboard

Videos

01. Sipexa Flow – Create New Form
02. Sipexa Flow Plugin for WordPress
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire sipexa-flow folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Creating a form

  1. Sign up for a free Sipexa Flow account. You have 2 options:
    a. Create a workspace through https://sipexaflow.com
    b. Create a workspace from left menu in WordPress

  2. Start building your web form or survey using the user-friendly drag & drop interface.
    a. Click “Design Your Form” menu item
    b. In “Data Entry Settings” tab, drag and drop “New Row” from right menu to left panel.
    c. Add any component into added row by drag and drop.
    d. Save your form.
    e. Enter your form in edit mode.

  3. Configure your web form in the Settings section.
    a. Open “General Settings” tab.
    b. Click “Do you wish to embed this form into your web page?” checkbox.
    c. Copy “WordPress Key” for using in your WordPress Blog.
    d. Paste “WordPress Key” into content of any page in WordPress Blog.
